name: jarli
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), w1)
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), w1)
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)

comment: Inference associated with ~ jarl . Partial converse of ~ ja (the other partial converse being ~ jarri ). (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Oct-2013.)
